alert.note: Alert for Western Prince William Sound (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 28 at 3:58PM AKST until November 30 at 3:00AM AKST by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 3 AM WEDNESDAY TO 3 AM AKST THURSDAY FOR TURNAGAIN PASS... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of up to 16 inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Turnagain Pass. * WHEN...From 3 AM Wednesday to 3 AM AKST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow is expected to fall across Turnagain Pass from Tuesday night through much of Thursday. The heaviest snow is expected Wednesday afternoon and evening where snow rates may reach or exceed 1 inch per hour.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1 or visit 511.alaska.gov.
